mapper.update:
update sys_dept
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
address = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
industry = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR },
is_company = #{isCompany,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
person_num = #{personNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
service_num = #{serviceNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
clean_area = #{cleanArea,jdbcType=INTEGER},
green_area = #{greenArea,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mechine_rate = #{mechineRate,jdbcType=FLOAT},
rubbish_volume = #{rubbishVolume,jdbcType=FLOAT},
renewable_resources_volume = #{renewableResourcesVolume,jdbcType=FLOAT},
work_start_time = #{workStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
administrative_division = #{administrativeDivision,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=FLOAT},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=FLOAT},
juridical_person = #{juridicalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
registered_time = #{registeredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
registered_capital = #{registeredCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
stock_rate =#{stockRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manager = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manager_phone = #{managerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vice_manager = #{viceManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vice_manager_phone = #{viceManagerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_dept set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, is_company = #{isCompany,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, person_num = #{personNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, service_num = #{serviceNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, clean_area = #{cleanArea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, green_area = #{greenArea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mechine_rate = #{mechineRate,jdbcType=FLOAT}, rubbish_volume = #{rubbishVolume,jdbcType=FLOAT}, renewable_resources_volume = #{renewableResourcesVolume,jdbcType=FLOAT}, work_start_time = #{workStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, administrative_division = #{administrativeDivision,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=FLOAT}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=FLOAT}, juridical_person = #{juridicalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registered_time = #{registeredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, registered_capital = #{registeredCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, stock_rate =#{stockRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_phone = #{managerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vice_manager = #{viceManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vice_manager_phone = #{viceManagerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fax = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from sys_dept d
d.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')

select
from sys_dept d
d.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')
and d.address LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{address}),'%')
and d.telephone LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{telephone}),'%')
and d.website LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{website}),'%')
and d.industry LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{industry}),'%')
and d.create_by LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{createBy}),'%')
and d.create_time <= #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and d.create_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and d.last_update_by LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{lastUpdateBy}),'%')
and d.administrative_division LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{administrativeDivision}),'%')
